name: d3-brush

scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../${npm_package_name}/dist/${npm_package_name}.js ${npm_package_name}.v${npm_package_version%%.*}.js && cp ../${npm_package_name}/dist/${npm_package_name}.min.js ${npm_package_name}.v${npm_package_version%%.*}.min.js && git add ${npm_package_name}.v${npm_package_version%%.*}.js ${npm_package_name}.v${npm_package_version%%.*}.min.js && git commit -m "${npm_package_name} ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j dist/${npm_package_name}.zip -- LICENSE README.md dist/${npm_package_name}.js dist/${npm_package_name}.min.js
